preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 20 grams of boron powder accurately using a digital scale.
2. Measure 100 grams of cobalt powder.
3. Measure 40 grams of titanium powder.
4. Measure 80 grams of zirconium powder.
5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container. Stir thoroughly for 10 minutes to ensure uniform distribution of all ingredients.
